features: 120 Hours Playtime: Bluetooth headphones redefine durability with a 120H-playtime, ensuring low power consumption and eco-friendly operation. Wireless headphones are designed for long hours of work and travel, featuring a stylish headphones case for protecting your headphones Bluetooth from damage while being easy to carry along.

Deep Bass ＆ Microphone: Our headphones wireless Bluetooth are equipped with dual 40mm dynamic drivers, delivering outstanding audio quality with robust and pristine bass. Choose from 4 unique EQ modes to customize your listening experience. The headphones with microphone ensure high-definition calls, making your conversations clearer.

Foldable Lightweight Headphones: Showcase your style with our uniquely designed Bluetooth headphones wireless. These over ear headphones weigh only 0.36 pounds, making them incredibly lightweight. The headband and ear cushions are filled with soft memory foam, ensuring comfortable wear. The adjustable headphones cater to all age groups, from kids to individuals of all generations, and the foldable feature enhances portability.

Bluetooth 5.3 ＆ Wired: Falebare wireless headphones Bluetooth provide a seamless music experience with enhanced Bluetooth 5.3 technology, allowing for fast connections up to 38 feet away. Rest assured, the reliable Bluetooth signal ensures interference-free listening. Additionally, as headphones wired, it boasts compatibility with a broader range of electronic devices and offers stability across various usage scenarios.

Warranty and Support: The package includes foldable Bluetooth headphones, a portable headphones case, a 3.5mm audio cable, a TYPE-C charging cable, and a user manual. We offer a 30-day hassle-free return policy and an 18-month warranty. If you have any questions or concerns, please feel free to contact us anytime.

Dual 40mm drives and deep bass technology let you experience music like never before. Provide reliable and stable quality Quality headphones must offer excellent sound and robust construction for lasting durability. Next page 1 Bluetooth 5.3 2 HiFi Stereo Sound 3 Bassup Technology

Enhance Your Workday with Bluetooth Headphones! Whether in a busy office or remote workspace, our headphones boost work efficiency. Enjoy uninterrupted sound, superior comfort, and wireless freedom for enhanced productivity. Unlock Wireless Headphones for Your Travels! Our wireless headphones offers an incredible 120 hours of battery life, perfect for long bus journeys or exploring new places. Enjoy uninterrupted entertainment throughout your travels with ease. Wireless Audio Bliss: Elevate Your Daily Commute! Elevate daily commutes and city strolls with our Bluetooth headphones. Redefine audio during subway rides and city walks. Enjoy cordless convenience and crystal-clear sound, enhancing your journey.

Enjoy Call Freedom with Bluetooth Headphones! Elevate outdoor calls with our advanced wireless Bluetooth headphones. Designed for on-the-move conversations during hikes, bike rides, or outdoor relaxation, they redefine communication outdoors.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewText: De sonido estamos bien, el bajo es bueno si se logra ecualizar suena aún mejor; pero lo que más me sorprende es la batería llevo una semana usándolos diariamente y no ha bajado de 90%, es una brutalidad.Excelente los recomiendo Full y más aún por su precio, la verdad que vale totalmente la pena.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars A great gift
reviews.reviewText: I would recommend these for anyone who in joy nice quality headphones with straight forward instructions, I was surprised at first by how light they were and expected them to be a bit fragile but was mistaken nice and durable. My only gripe is that the bass is not as powerful as I would like which is personal but over all a solid 8 as far a headphones go. >Get them<

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Got these for my daughter for Christmas and she loves them.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My favorite headphones ever. Got stolen sadly :(
reviews.reviewText: The battery life is the main thing i love about these headphones. I am a bit of an audiophile, as i'm rarely caught not listening to music whether its through headphones or over a speaker. These headphones would outlast my phone battery many times over as well as survive 12-15 hour school/work days of non stop use. These headphones could last almost a week before needing to be recharged.The sound quality is pretty good for the price point, really nice bass, and you can appreciate all the little colors and components of your music. The sound through the complementary aux cord is decent as well, but I rarely even had to use it because of the great battery life that these headphones have, and the fast charging speed.I had these for about 3-4ish months before I lost them (someone from my school definitely took them) and i'll probably repurchase once I get the cash (and also keep better track of them this time)

reviews.reviewText: No son tan excelentes para usarlos en el gym. Pero resuelven

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The Falebare Bluetooth Headphones Over Ear offer a comfortable and enjoyable listening experience. With their over-ear design, they provide a snug fit for immersive sound quality. The Bluetooth connectivity adds convenience, and the headphones are well-suited for extended use. While excelling in comfort and performance, a longer battery life could further enhance their appeal. Overall, the Falebare Bluetooth Headphones Over Ear are a reliable choice for those seeking quality over-ear headphones with wireless capabilities.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good very good sound quality
reviews.reviewText: I got these headphones because I needed some headphones to take with me to the gym when I work out that wasn't the ones that you put in your ear and once I received these and using them the first time I immediately do this was the best idea I had came up with because the sound quality on them are so great that I can completely zone out and work out in peace very easy to connect to devices and you can connect to multiple devices at once which is a plus most Bluetooth devices does not allow you to do that I also use them to take calls and it takes calls very well as well I'm able to hear who I'm speaking to and they also can hear me very clear and well so the mics on the headphones actually work well definitely a great Buy

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars A pair of bluetooth headphones that get the job done
reviews.reviewText: The headphones work just like any other pair of bluetooth headphones I've had. They work fine for what I would consider an economy level of headphones. The sound quality is on par with other headphones in the same price range as well as the "feel". The construction is decent and I believe these will last a while. Battery life is neither good or bad... I can get through a whole day without needing to rechange, so that is always a plus. If you're looking for a cheap pair or bluetooth headphones that will keep you entertained, these do the trick!
